jd: From: Chaitanya, RuriSoft LLC chaitanya@rurisoft.com Reply to: chaitanya@rurisoft.com Databricks Developer Location : Dallas TX ( Onsite ) Note: Need 10+ years H1B and strong experience in Databricks and locals to Dallas, TX Only Experience:•⁠ ⁠9+ years of experience in data engineering, with a strong focus on data migration and ETL processes in DataBricks•⁠ ⁠Proven experience with Databricks on AWS, including cluster management, Spark programming, and data pipeline development.•⁠ ⁠Extensive hands-on experience with Teradata, Oracle, SQLServer including database management, query optimization, and data extraction.•⁠ ⁠Proficiency in using InformaticaETL tools, including Informatica (ICS / PC/IDQ),Cloud DataIntegration, and advanced data transformation techniques. Technical Skills:• Strong proficiency in SQL, Python, ,PySpark or Scala, particularly in the context of data engineering.• In-depth knowledge of AWS services (e.g., S3, EC2, RDS, IAM) and their integration with Databricks.• Familiarity with data warehousing concepts, data modeling, and large-scale data processing.• Understanding of data security, privacy, and compliance requirements in cloud environments.
